subject: Re: [junit] Re: Testing classes that rely on a datasource?
msgSnippet: ... It s not very complicated to write a mock implementation of data source for testing purposes. I have one lying around using hsqldb and providing
messageBody:
> Can you use another implementation of DataSource for your tests? I
> used Apache Basic Datasource implementation from apache.org for my
> tests.

It's not very complicated to write a mock implementation of data source for
testing purposes. I have one lying around using hsqldb and providing
verification of all connections being closed. If anyone's interested I'll
upload it.

Johannes
